explanation: [0-0] A man in a watermelon-patterned shirt stands in front of a TV, mouth agape, watching the screen. The TV displays a game screen, where a game character stands with his back to the viewer at the edge of a tall building. Information is displayed in the upper right corner, including a fist icon, time, amount of money, a full health bar, and a full star rating. The amount of money is 99999999, and both the health bar and star rating are full. In the lower left corner, there's a mini-map, marking the character's location and some landmarks.
[0-3] The man puts his index finger to his lips, signaling silence, then opens his hand and gestures, turns towards the TV, and snaps his fingers at the game character.

[3-5] The game character then jumps off the tall building. The man covers his mouth with his hand and turns to look at the TV.

[5-7] The game character continues to fall, and the man reaches out and gestures at the TV screen, saying something.

[7-9] The game character hits the ground, surrounded by blood. The screen suddenly turns black and white, frozen at the moment of impact. The man clenches one hand into a fist. A gray rectangle appears in the middle of the TV screen with English subtitles inside.

[9-13] Finally, the man turns his head to look forward, covers his mouth with his hand, widens his eyes, and then leaves the screen after putting his hand down.
